hero.name: Hudayfa
hero.title: and i am a web developer
hero.desc: Passionate about front-end development, I love creating clean, modern and accessible interfaces.

steps.label: The turning point
steps.text: Curious by nature, I discovered the world of coding by exploring HTML, CSS and JavaScript. I quickly became passionate about creating interfaces, which naturally led me to web development.

steps.label: Education
steps.text: Holder of a professional Bachelor's degree in 'Internet Professions – Web Applications' from the University of Limoges, I have developed strong skills in front-end development, back-end development, and project management.

steps.label: My vision
steps.text: I place great importance on accessibility, performance and aesthetics. I believe in simple, useful and well-designed interfaces that are always user-oriented. I enjoy solving real problems with creativity.

items.title: MonFeed
items.desc: Project developed during my final-year internship at monFeed (formerly TheWebCake). MonFeed is an AI-powered platform that enables users to create, schedule, and publish content across social media. It features a dashboard, content editor, calendar, and AI-based analytics.

items.title: Flag
items.desc: Flag is an exciting group project developed in the second year of our degree. The game challenges your knowledge of world flags by displaying a random flag from any country. Your goal is to guess which country it belongs to. The more correct answers you give, the longer your winning streak grows.

items.title: Gourmet_Atlas
items.desc: Gourmet_Atlas is a group project created during the second year of our degree. It allows users to explore cuisines from around the world using the World Food Guide API. The app provides detailed information on each cuisine, lets users discover dishes with ingredients and preparation steps, and includes a photo gallery to visualize culinary specialties.
